text:
TomTom| JAVA developer | Amsterdam, NL |

You might have heard about us or our navigation products before, but come and visit our Youtube to see all the new stuff that we are doing: https://www.youtube.com/tomtom

With all the innovations like driverless cars, the automotive industry is experiencing really exciting times. Here at TomTom we have a cutting edge road map ahead and we are looking to expand our teams to deliver it.

At the moment we are looking for multiple JAVA developers at various levels to join the backend team in our HQ in Amsterdam.

Jobs page: https://www.tomtom.com/careers//jobs/Java-Search-Engine-Engi...
